article_title: World Central Kitchen calls for independent investigation into strike.
sentence: World  Central  Kitchen  (WCK)  has  called  for  an  independent  investigation  after  seven  of  its  workers  were  killed  in  an  Israeli  airstrike  in  Gaza.

article_title: World Central Kitchen calls for independent investigation into strike.
sentence: The  seven  victims,  who  were  working  for  World  Central  Kitchen  (WCK),  were  killed  when  their  convoy  was  attacked  from  the  air  on  Monday.

article_title: World Central Kitchen calls for independent investigation into strike.
sentence: Three  of  the  killed  aid  workers  were  British  nationals  .

article_title: World Central Kitchen calls for independent investigation into strike.
sentence: A  Polish  national,  an  Australian,  a  Palestinian  and  a  dual  US-Canadian  citizen  were  also  killed.
